Package org.apache.spark.network.shuffle

Class RetryingBlockTransferor

java.lang.Object
org.apache.spark.network.shuffle.RetryingBlockTransferor
public class RetryingBlockTransferor extends Object
Wraps another BlockFetcher or BlockPusher with the ability to automatically retry block transfers which fail due to IOExceptions, which we hope are due to transient network conditions. This transferor provides stronger guarantees regarding the parent BlockTransferListener. In particular, the listener will be invoked exactly once per blockId, with a success or failure.

    static interface 
    RetryingBlockTransferor.BlockTransferStarter
    Used to initiate the first transfer for all blocks, and subsequently for retrying the transfer on any remaining blocks.
